extendedInfo.description: Top menu let you do more things.If you have question or you want to help eFile to add support for your language , please email support@domobile.com , thanks.Easy to manage your filesSupport Multi-task, Multi-window.FTPShare wireless sharing feature, no data cable to transfer files via WIFI network. SMB client, you can access the LAN shared directory. FTP client function, you can access the ftp server.Drag files to any folderSystem status, memory manager, app managersearchbookmarkscolor labelZip/unzip fileExtract rar fileInstall apkSend multiple attachments by email, bluetoothList, Grid file viewShows Hidden fileText editorset backgroundSet wallpaper, ringtone or create shortcutthumbnail viewKeywords and tags:File Explorer File Manager HTTP FTP FTP Server File sharing APK App Manager File Expert SMB TXT reader file WIFI wifi sharing ES ES File Explorer Astro Astro File Manager File Picker Web Sharing WIFI File Explorer SwiFTP SD SD Card Files Copy Move Cut Paste Create Rename folders sharing files managing files file manager file operator top file manager best file manager

reviews.title: Hats off !
reviews.comment: This is simply the perfection, user friendly, efficient, efile should be the most popular file manager in the market.,B-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NEED TO UPDATE FOR ICE CREAM SANDWICH!!
reviews.comment: NEED TO UPDATE FOR ICS...CRASHES EVERYTIME I FINISH OPENING A MEDIA FILE THROUGH THE PROGRAM!!!!!  Using updated Galaxy S2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close issue for months.
reviews.comment: This is the best file explorer I\'ve ever tried ... It\'s beautiful, and powerful at the same time. I\'ve contacted the developer about the force closes you but have had no luck. Also, although it tries to open .rar files, you can\'t always trust it to do it right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best yet for my needs!
reviews.comment: Been using it for more than a year, force close too often, otherwise I would have given a 5 star rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes too often
reviews.comment: I used to used this, but it usually  crashes, even after a factory reset. I\'ll use something else now
reviews.author: Cameron Boxall

reviews.title: Best file manager
reviews.comment: EFile is really handy and the most user-friendly file manager I have tried on Android. Really the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant force close
reviews.comment: Running on jellybean, sgs3. Very irritating!! Was my favorite file manager. Dev! Pls fix it asap!!
reviews.author: Cat P

reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
reviews.comment: Everything is perfect. Just add dropbox. I am using ES File Manager until dropbox is on efile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, the addition of identifier icons next to apks is a great time saver, many great functions and no ads. Good job DoMobile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Was able to manage my ringtones and files I didn\'t even know were there.  Very handy app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: small size, great interface, fast. will be 5 stars when root functions get added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Tried astro file manager first, caused my phone to reset. Efile Works perfectly on my LG Optimus 3D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice App
reviews.comment: Runs fine on droid incredible. Makes file manipulation easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fab app
reviews.comment: It is the best file explorer worth downloading
reviews.author: Mandeep PANWAR

reviews.title: Gnex
reviews.comment: Used to be my go to file manager. Getting sick of fc\'s though! Off to find another until this updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best file manager I have found so far. And t have tried quite a few
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!!!
reviews.comment: Ok so this manager is: simple, fast, free, And add free, how better can it be. Thank you for this great browser!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I had no issues, but the fact there is advertisement + it requires access to internet + your phone serial number bothers me and makes no sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small and sweet!
reviews.comment: Does 95% of File Expert and Astro. 25% of the size. What\'s not to love!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force Closes
reviews.comment: It\'s an excellent file manager but please fix for xperia s it force closes when a file is opened
reviews.author: Peter Langat
